worms.message: Writing around in the mud, these would make good bait.

guppies.message: Small fish to catch big fish.

insects.message: The nastier the critter, the tastier it is.

mussels.message: Hard shells protect their squishy and edible interior.

crustaceans.message: All manner of shrimp and krill fill the bucket.

squid.message: Tentacled, translucent, smelly and yet perfect bait.

ground-fish.message: Various fish bits and guts compiled for large hunters.

fly-tackle.message: Brightly colored and fuzzy, used to attract River fish.

cages.message: Traps of varying sizes to catch all manner of crustaceans.

spoon-lure.message: A small lure made to resemble the shape of a fish.

harpoon.message: A manual weapon loaded with a large barb tipped spear.

spinner-lure.message: Long strands extend out of this lure, giving the impression of a squid.

boat.message: An older vessel that may need a few patches before setting sail.

fuel.message: Diesel for any length trip out on the water.

diving.message: An assortment of aquatic gear including oxygen tanks, a mask and a snorkel.

rods.message: Rods built with reinforced materials and lines, allowing you to catch the strongest of fish.
